message: I'm offering this product to you for $10000. I want to give you a chance to buy it for a steal. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to let it go for this price because I'm looking to declutter my inventory. What do you say?
I'm not sure about this, I need more information about the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is a top-of-the-line item. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer a'satisfaction guarantee' - if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. But I need to let you know that this is a rare opportunity, and I'm only offering this price of $10000 because I value our potential business relationship. What do you say?
